name: EltakoSafe
0: ”Alexa, set dining room light to 60 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Connect Alexa to your Eltako system and easily control your smart home devices (light, shading, heating) with your voice.
With this skill, your devices integrated via the Eltako GFA5 app can also be operated by voice command.

A MiniSafe2 controller from Eltako is required for operation.
An Eltako cloud account is required to set up the skill.

To control your devices with Alexa, use the following commands:

light: 
“Alexa, turn off dining room light.”
“Alexa, set dining room light to 60 percent.”

shading:
“Alexa, set living room roller shutter to 40 percent.”

heating:
“Alexa, set underfloor heating to 24 degrees.”
